resources.string: If you enjoy using LogoLicious, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won\'t take more than a minute. Thanks for your support!
Show introduction screens at next startup.
TIP: You can drag the item with your finger and use two fingers to scale and/rotate the item.\n
TIP: Click here for more information about LogoLicious and/or to unlock more features..\n
TIP: Use the color palette to match your skin complexion or just to add some funky colors. \n
TIP: Use the sliders to adjust and blend the new feature(s) to your image.\n
TIP: Use the eraser to erase features or parts of the features and make them fit perfectly. Do not forget to turn the eraser off when you are done.\n
TIP: Did you know you could remove the logo and hashtags on saved images? Click on logo on top right corner and go to settings.\n
No application found to handle this action
The Logo has an invalid dimension. Try choosing different one.
Image taken is not received. If the error continues, please inform us. Thanks
Image is somewhat corrupted. If the error continues, please inform us. Thanks
"Sharing your file. Give us a moment while we prepare this in high resolution."
"Put some Text or Logo on the Editor."
"You cannot save while you are in live mode."
"You cannot share while you are in live mode."
"Be sure you are not in live mode."
"Nothing to Share! Add logo or text."
Our app can only cater 1 image at a time.
Ooooops ! I crashed, but a report has been sent to my developer to help fix the issue !
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK.
You might add your comments about the problem below:
"A logo within this template has been deleted."
"Please note, the selected logo file is larger than 2.5mb. We recommend a logo size less than 2.5mb. You can proceed, but the app may crash as a result of an out of memory issue."

*If you choose to uncheck \'Don\'t ask me again\' you can change the saving preferences in the Logolicious settings: \n>> Click the Logolicious button in the right top. \n \u0020\u0020\u0020>> Settings tab
You can find the saved items in your \nGallery/Logolicious or \nGallery/Others/Logolicious

Hey Logolicious,


I would love a new logo! And the total price of $199 sounds great. Below is a list of information and answers that will help you create my new logo:

YOUR BACKGROUND INFORMATION:


1. ‣[My Name/Business name].................................................................

2. I’m envisioning the logo also contains the following text: ‣[Insert tagline] ................................................... Please use this text ‣[exactly as it is/creatively]?.

3. Go visit my page ‣[Insert: http://www.???????.com] to get an idea of my current style.

4. ‣[Please enter] business description, (+ activities, the mission, and vision): 
......................................................................................................................

LOGO STYLE:

5. I’m imagining the style my the logo to have a 
‣[A] modern and corporate vibe
‣[B] playful retro design
‣[C] Handwritten / Calligraphy style

6. Please use there ‣[color(s)] 
and avoid ‣[color(s)] 

7. Attached I include ‣[a sketch/an image/my prior logo that needs updating/anything that is useful].

TO RECEIVE INVOICE:

8. My PayPal email account is: ‣[insert email address].

Thank you

______________________________________________________________________

Terms and Conditions:

Step 1: You receive a personal (non-automated) email with an acceptance of your order and potentially clarification of your request.
Step 2: You will receive a payment request from oder@logolicious.com
Step 3: You will deposit $100 via Paypal as a confirmation of the order.
Step 4: Within 24 hours you will receive three (3) logo proposals by email.
Step 5: You choose the one you like best, and (if necessary) provide suggestions/modifications
Step 6: Within 24 hours you receive the logo of choice, adjusted to your feedback.
Step 7: (If needed) provide feedback once more.
Step 8: Within 24 hours receive the final logo draft.
Step 9: You will receive a payment request for the remaining $99.
Step 10: After full payment, you will receive the logo in high-resolution format: png, jpg, pdf (vector).

PLEASE PROVIDE ANSWERS TO ALL QUESTIONS IN THIS EMAIL BEFORE SENDING!
PNG (= no pixel loss, but large file).
JPG 100% high quality (= no noticeable quality loss, smaller size). EXIF data embedded
JPG 40% small file (= reduced output, small quality loss). EXIF data embedded.

Things may not be in place or even going outside the image since this template is a different Aspect Ratio. Are you sure to continue? \n\nNote: You can create a template for this Aspect ratio using the save template after you have added items on the photo.
"Caution, your device is running low on memory (RAM). Please close other applications to avoid program failure"

Hi, your phone is running low on memory. Logolicious cannot proceed without the risk of crashing. Please exit the app and close other applications or restart your phone. Another thing to try is using a small image. Logolicious does not alter image quality and therefore is a bit memory intensive.
Some logo are being downscaled because the allocated memory android provide for each app is not much.
"There\'s a problem uploading the logo. Try another logo.
Due to the size of your image, there might not be enough free memory to process this photo. If issues occur, please downscale your image or quit one or more programs, and then try again.

New feature: Add your own font to Logolicious

Step 1: Save a font (.ttf file) to your phones\' standard \'downloads\' folder.

Step 2: Simply click the \'SCAN FOR FONTS\' button right here and the font(s) in your download folder will become available automatically.
Something’s wrong with your subscription, but you’ve still got access during a temporary grace period. Tap to fix it.
Your subscription is canceled and will expire on %1$s. Tap to restore your subscription.
Wrong taxi? A different account is already using your subscription, but you can transfer your subscription to this account.
Wrong taxi? A different account is already using your %1$s subscription, but you can transfer your subscription to this account.
Wrong taxi? A different account is already using your %1$s and %2$s subscriptions, but you can transfer your subscriptions to this account.
Classy Taxi is stuck! Your account is on hold because there’s a problem with your payment method. Update your payment method or add a new one to restore your subscription.
Classy Taxi is taking a break. Payments for your subscription are paused and will automatically resume on %1$s. You can resume your subscription at any time.
Welcome to the basic classy taxi, driving through the peaceful cool of the night.
Welcome to the premium space taxi, flying through the endless possibilities of space.

You need to subscribe to a Premium plan
